alert.note: Alert for Durham; Granville; Orange; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Person, northern Orange, northwestern Granville and northwestern Durham Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alton to Prospect Hill, or about 4 miles west of Roxboro. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Rougemont, Concord, Carr, Mayo Reservoir, Bahama, Bethel Hill, Bushy Fork, Moriah and Berea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
